Title: Sunshine Days
Plot: Doggett and Reyes investigate a murder outside the house that the original Brady Bunch series was filmed in. The house is owned by a man named Oliver who is obsessed with the show and has rigged the house into a series of traps and changing appearances to look like the Brady house.
GuestStars: Damon Kaylor, Arlene Pileggi, Danielle Savre, Nick Campisano, Marcie Lynn Ross, Robbie Troy, Keith Forster, Sharayah Montgomery, Jack Bensinger, Stephanie M. Herrera, Nolan Irwin, Michael Emerson, John Aylward, Ty
